alert.note: Alert for De Witt; Logan; Macon (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued August 01 at 5:26AM CDT until August 01 at 5:45AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 545 AM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN LOGAN...SOUTHWESTERN DE WITT AND NORTHERN MACON COUNTIES... At 526 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kenney, or 10 miles southwest of Clinton, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Decatur, Clinton, Forsyth, Maroa, Mount Pulaski, Harristown, Warrensburg, Argenta, Oreana, Latham, Kenney, Chestnut, Weldon Springs State Park, Rowell, Elwin and Hallsville. This includes Interstate 72 between mile markers 132 and 145. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
